Galloping available on the Tapeta track up to 2hrs before the first race.

conditions.stablingComment: Companions, overnight stabling and stable staff accommodation must be pre-booked by emailing stables@chester-races.com by 12pm the day before racing.
conditions.bookingComment:
Limited stable staff accommodation is available and will be allocated as follows:
1 horse = 1 member of stable staff and 1 senior member of staff
2 or more horses = 1 member of stable staff per horse and 1 senior member of staff
Please include full names of all staff and a contact number for your senior team member when booking. 
Unfortunately we are unable to accommodate those under the age of 18.

conditions.groundComment: Padded hurdles will be in use from this fixture onwards.
conditions.rails: Wood Bend is out 15yds. Stands Bend is out 22yds Chase and 15yds Hurdle.
conditions.weatherComment:
11mm on Monday 12th September, dry but cool since. 
Sunday - Dry but overcast with highs of 16C. 
Monday - Dry but overcast with highs of 14C. 
Tuesday - Dry but overcast with highs of 17C. 
Wednesday - Dry but overcast with highs of 19C.
Thursday - Dry but overcast with highs of 19C during the day. 2mm of rain overnight. 
Friday - Dry but overcast with highs of 17C. 
Saturday - Sunny spells with a chance of light showers later in the afternoon, highs of 15C.
conditions.other: Padded hurdles will be in use from this fixture onwards. In addition all hurdles and fences will have white toe boards and guard rails.
conditions.watering:
40mm applied between Tuesday and Friday. 
Selective watering to maintain good ground on raceday morning.

conditions.weatherComment: 3mm rain in the last 24 hours. A cooler day, mainly cloudy with some showers likely and a 10mph NW wind. 11c.
conditions.other:
ARO race.  Please note that we will have an Arab race prior to the thoroughbred card.
TRACK MAINTENANCE. The track was harrowed to a depth of 6" on Wednesday 21st September. Cooler conditions & 5mm rain in the last 7 days means we expect  the track to ride close to Standard 
The track will be harrowed to a depth of 3 1/2" and re-instated with a gallopmaster finish.

conditions.rails:
The rail on the round course is positioned 8yds out at the 1m4f start, decreasing to 4yds out around Swinley Botttom then increasing to 14yds out at the Home straight where the rail finishes in a cutaway. 
The straight course is divided in two with a rail in the middle of the course from the 1m start to approx 2.5f from the winning line. 
The stands side will be in use for this meeting

conditions.weatherComment:
3mm rain on Monday evening.  2mm during Tuesday afternoon, followed by 2mm rain overnight into Wednesday. Dry Wednesday morning, but 6mm rain late afternoon and overnight into Thursday. Dry throughout Thursday and sunny periods in the afternoon, 14C. Dry overnight into Friday, and a cloudy start to the day. 5mm rain on Friday afternoon, stopping around 5pm, followed by a further 2.5mm rain overnight into Saturday, making 7.5mm in last 24 hours.
Forecast: Dry & bright day expected on Saturday, with a steady breeze and max temps of 16C.
conditions.other: Head Groundsman: Stephen Berry (07789 984520)

conditions.rails:
The rail on the round course is positioned 8yds out at the 1m4f start, decreasing to 4yds out around Swinley Botttom then increasing to 14yds out at the Home straight where the rail finishes in a cutaway. 
The straight course is divided in two with a rail in the middle of the course from the 1m start to approx 2.5f from the winning line. 
The stands side will be in use for this meeting

conditions.groundComment: WE HAVE ABANDONNED THE MEETING ON GROUNDS THAT THE GOING IS NOT SAFE TO RACE ON.  WE CANNOT RID HARD FROM THE GOING DESCRIPTION.
conditions.weatherComment: We had 6.5mm of rain Friday.  . No rain due Sunday now.. Temp.8-15 degrees C..
conditions.stablingComment:
We had less rain than predicted on Friday (6mm) . Hard is still in the going and due to a restriction in water extraction from our rivers we are limited in the amount of water we can irrigate,. We will continue to try and improve and see how much rain we have on Sunday am. but I will inspect on Sunday am prior to 10 am. to determine if we are fit to race. 
Simon Sherwood. 07836215639.
conditions.inspectionComment: Will inspect prior to 10am. to see if we can rid hard from the going description.
conditions.watering: Will continue to try and improve .
conditions.cotcMobile: 07836215639 I HAD A MEETING WITH OUR BHA REPRESENTATIVE THIS MORNING.

conditions.weatherComment: A dry, breezy outlook bar rain/wind coming from the West Friday (8-15mm). Temp.8-15 degrees C..
conditions.stablingComment:
We have had a total of 4 ins of rain since July 1st. and as most people know we are on very free draining gravel soil.  Until the water table rises a bit it is difficult to keep the moisture in the topsoil. We are hoping for excesses in the predicted rain but will review daily. 
Simon Sherwood. 07836215639.
conditions.watering: We have applied approx.30mm to date. Will continue to try and improve but will need help from the rain due on Friday.
